item.title: 3. Behind the scenes of R-Ladies IWD2018 Twitter action!
item.description: As told by Page and Sheila On March the 8th, International Women’s Day, we ran a continuous feed of awesome R-Ladies profiles from our directory via @rladies_iwd2018. It was a blast!
